VoiceList.Entry: Cloud “…The town was quiet.”
“Everyone must be in their houses, afraid to come out because of the monsters.”
“No,maybe they're afraid of us…”
Sephiroth “We leave for the reactor at dawn. Make sure you get to sleep early.”
Sephiroth “All we need is one lookout, so you others,get some rest.”
Sephiroth “Oh,and…”
Sephiroth “You may visit your family and friends.”
“Man… I'm so nervous.” How come? I'm excited.
“Look,you never know when a monster's gonna show up,right?”
“…That's right. Don't blow your chance to become a hero…”
“Hey,if you don't calm down, you won't get a good evaluation…”
“Hmm? You from Shinra?” That's right! Who are you?
“Geez… Big-headed young kid.”
“I'm the town's… …. …!?”
“Aren't you Cloud?”
“Don't you know me?”
Cloud “You're Tifa's…”
“Right. I'm Tifa's father.”
Cloud “…Long time no see,sir.”
Tifa's father “…Stay away from my daughter.”
Tifa's father “We don't need the Shinra's help to protect our town!”
Tifa's father “If I knew this was going to happen, I would've made mountain climbing off limits…”
Tifa's father “I hate myself for asking you this,but…”
“Don't take your eyes off of Tifa! Hurry up and go back to her side!”
Tifa's father “Until we know that there's no danger, we're not moving.”
“I heard Sephiroth was coming so I brought my camera.”
“I want a shot of Sephiroth and a monster.” Take my picture. Get back in the house,it's dangerous.
“I don't take pictures of nobodys.”
“All right… ÙFat-head…”
“Hey? ÙThis guy's a real…”
“You… Are you Cloud?”
“Really? So that's how it is,huh?”
“Gosh,Cloud, you've grown up to be a nice-looking lad.” Then take my picture It's dangerous,go home
“Let's do this,Cloud. Let me take a picture of you with Sephiroth.”
“OK,OK… ÙFat-head… ÙYou're just his assistant.”
“Think they'd let me take a picture?”
“What's Sephiroth doing?”
Sephiroth “Once the guide gets here,we're heading out.”
Tifa's father “Listen to me,Sephiroth. In case something happens…”
Sephiroth “…Trust me.”
Tifa “I'll be all right,Dad!”
“I have two men from SOLDIER with me.”
Tifa “I'm Tifa. Nice to meet you!”
Cloud “Tifa! You're the guide?”
Tifa “That's right.”
“It so happens I'm the number one guide in this town.”
Cloud “It's too dangerous! I can't get you involved in this!”
Sephiroth “There's no problem if you protect her.”
Sephiroth “…Let's go.”
“Umm…”
“Mr. Sephiroth! Please let me take one picture for a memento!”
“Tifa,can you ask him for me too?”
“Great,thank you!”
“I'll give each of you a copy once I get it developed!”
“Cheeeeese!”
Cloud “This Mansion…”
“…No,I'll come here later.”
Sephiroth “Hey,stay over here!”
Cloud “Up ahead is…Mt. Nibel.”
“I'll tell you about the time I went into the mountains.”
“Hey,calm down! Wait over here.”
“…Late again.”
“I was so nervous. I couldn't get any sleep…”
Zangan “There's nothing that'll harm the town,right?”
Cloud “…Why do you ask?”
Cloud “It's Sephiroth. He would never do that.”
Zangan “The Shinra showed up to eliminate any information that could be embarrassing to the company.”
“You pick these things up when you travel as much as I do.”
Zangan “…Oh my. You sure do have faith.”
“Is that you,Cloud?” …Yeah …No
“Mom?”
“Here,I've brought you something!”
“Don't tell anyone in town!”
